org.concordion.ext.storyboard

Class ScreenshotCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.ext.storyboard.StoryboardItem
      • org.concordion.ext.storyboard.Card
        • org.concordion.ext.storyboard.ScreenshotCard

  • public class ScreenshotCard
extends Card
    Card that takes and presents screenshots of the system under test.

        Description copied from class: Card
        Override this method to update whether the card should be added to the storyboard or not.
        Overrides:
        shouldAppend in class Card
        Parameters:
        hasFailure - True if the test failed, or if within a section break, the section was marked as failure
        Returns:
        True to append card to storyboard, false to ignore card
